sections.name: Controls
instructions: Press ESC to enter fullscreen view
Click the play/pause button to alternate between editor and runtime modes
Drag and drop assets into the viewport to load them
Select an entity in the Scene tab to view its properties
Use the gizmos to Translate (G), Rotate (R) or Scale (S) the selected model
Press MOUSE_WHEEL and move the mouse to look around
Press LEFT_SHIFT + MOUSE_WHEEL and move the mouse to move the camera
With an entity selected, press RIGHT_MOUSE to open a context menu
